author: jsdelfino
msg: Minor fixes to bring up tutorial/nodes-jee/catalog-webapp. Look for runtime JARs in lib/ in addition to modules/. Use local copies of contribution JARs in a WAR if available. Use the correct classloader to load the NodeImplFactory in a webapp environment. Packaged the necessary JARs in the tutorial sample catalog webapp and fixed the call to a local version of the catalog service in the JSP.

author: dhruba
msg: HADOOP-3033. The BlockReceiver thread in the datanode writes data to
the block file, changes file position (if needed) and flushes all by
itself. The PacketResponder thread does not flush block file. (dhruba)
